GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object from the id requested

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the votes either incremented or decremented by the given patch object value

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments corresponding to the article_id

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a new comment object with the article id chosen in the path

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes selected comment from the array of all comments
